languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт стоит на коленях, схватившись обеими руками за камень душ, словно за спасательную нить. Ее взгляд потух, дыхание сбилось, а тело бьет мелкая дрожь — с ритуалом точно что-то идет не так.{/n}
{n}Yrliet is on her knees, clinging to the spirit stone like a lifeline with both her hands. Her eyes are dim, her breath is uneven, and her body is trembling. The rite has definitely gone awry.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт стоит на коленях, схватившись обеими руками за камень душ, словно за спасательную нить. Ее взгляд потух, дыхание сбилось, а тело бьет мелкая дрожь — с ритуалом точно что-то идет не так.{/n}

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特跪在地上，像抓住救命稻草一样双手紧握着灵魂石。她目光涣散、呼吸紊乱，身躯颤抖不已。仪式肯定出了问题。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet is on her knees, clinging to the spirit stone like a lifeline with both her hands. Her eyes are dim, her breath is uneven, and her body is trembling. The rite has definitely gone awry.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特跪在地上，像抓住救命稻草一样双手紧握着灵魂石。她目光涣散、呼吸紊乱，身躯颤抖不已。仪式肯定出了问题。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet está postrada de rodillas, aferrándose a su joya espiritual con ambas manos como si fuese un salvavidas. Su mirada está apagada, su respiración es irregular y su cuerpo tiembla. No cabe duda, el ritual se ha malogrado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet is on her knees, clinging to the spirit stone like a lifeline with both her hands. Her eyes are dim, her breath is uneven, and her body is trembling. The rite has definitely gone awry.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet está postrada de rodillas, aferrándose a su joya espiritual con ambas manos como si fuese un salvavidas. Su mirada está apagada, su respiración es irregular y su cuerpo tiembla. No cabe duda, el ritual se ha malogrado.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet est à genoux et s'agrippe à sa pierre-esprit de ses deux mains. Son regard est vide et son corps tremble au rythme de sa respiration saccadée. Le rite a mal tourné, de toute évidence.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet is on her knees, clinging to the spirit stone like a lifeline with both her hands. Her eyes are dim, her breath is uneven, and her body is trembling. The rite has definitely gone awry.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet est à genoux et s'agrippe à sa pierre-esprit de ses deux mains. Son regard est vide et son corps tremble au rythme de sa respiration saccadée. Le rite a mal tourné, de toute évidence.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet kniet und klammert sich mit beiden Händen an den Seelenstein wie an einen Rettungsanker. Ihr Blick ist trüb, ihr Atem ungleichmäßig, und ihr Körper zittert. Das Ritual ist definitiv gescheitert.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet is on her knees, clinging to the spirit stone like a lifeline with both her hands. Her eyes are dim, her breath is uneven, and her body is trembling. The rite has definitely gone awry.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet kniet und klammert sich mit beiden Händen an den Seelenstein wie an einen Rettungsanker. Ihr Blick ist trüb, ihr Atem ungleichmäßig, und ihr Körper zittert. Das Ritual ist definitiv gescheitert.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは膝をつき、両手でまるでそれが命綱であるかのように魂縛石にしがみついている。目はかすみ、息は乱れ、体は震えている。儀式は間違いなく失敗した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet is on her knees, clinging to the spirit stone like a lifeline with both her hands. Her eyes are dim, her breath is uneven, and her body is trembling. The rite has definitely gone awry.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは膝をつき、両手でまるでそれが命綱であるかのように魂縛石にしがみついている。目はかすみ、息は乱れ、体は震えている。儀式は間違いなく失敗した。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet; dizlerinin üstüne çökmüş, ruh taşını sanki hayatı ona bağlıymış gibi iki eliyle tutuyor. Gözleri kısılmış, nefes alış verişi düzensiz ve bedeni titriyor. Ayin kesinlikle ters gitmiş.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet is on her knees, clinging to the spirit stone like a lifeline with both her hands. Her eyes are dim, her breath is uneven, and her body is trembling. The rite has definitely gone awry.{/n}

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
